title: Recurve Bow now builds out of 2 daggers
body:
PBE[13/04]

{{item:1043}} 
NEW RECIPE: Now builds out of two Daggers [ 450 Gold ] + 200 Gold Recipe
Now has a new UNIQUE passive: Basic attacks deal an additional 10 physical damage on-hit.

Recurve bow now valid item?

Source: [News of Legends](http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/wip-pbe-1304-changes-to-recurve-bow-and-runaans-hurricane-new-summoner-icons-chroma-packs-for-leona-blitz-garen-in-game-37189/)

replies.body: Why this is not in Nashor tooth?
Because Nashors Tooth has 20% CDR. 10% from {{item:3108}}  and 10% from {{item:3101}}.

¬¬ And ? 

Obviusly you loss 10% Cd by the On-Hit passive, and finally you got the same shiit, 20% CD, On Hit passive on the Nashor.

Stinger its a item that seriously need to be REMOVED of the game.

Nashors Tooth has the lowest base on hit damage but high CDR. To buy Nashors tooth instead of an other on hit item, is often a decision for CDR and against (base) on hit damage. That you have to make this decision during the build path, make sence for me.

And I don't think that Stinger should be removed. 40% AS+10% CDR is probably better in many situations on many champions than 30% AS+10 on hit. Sometimes I buy Nashors Tooth because of the CDR, and i want to have that CDR as soon as possible. Stinger and Nashors Tooth are underrated items.
Its better if Stinger its removed

> [{quoted}](name=Tis a nice day,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bozHWRn3,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-16T00:09:49.460+0000)
>

> Recurve bow now valid item?

It's not that it ever was an invalid item, it's just that it only builds into two items that have niche uses. _And there's nothing wrong with that._
It doesn't even seem needed, because it's not like there is a huge gold amount to get the bow; BF is 1550 after all.  It's odd for Riot to make Daggers into Recurve bow; it doesn't need steps.   What, are they going to make Recurve Bow just a pair of daggers in recipes?  Is every item with more than 30%AS going to need a bow now?  It's just senseless to do that, so why Riot would even bother with the recipe change is a mystery.

valid? nah
save me 1 slot when I'm trying to build stalkers? totally
